page.title: 14Education Part 2
page.content: {Classroom organisation}is dictated by the small roll and the building itse- lf.The Infants occupy the smaller of the 2 rooms and the Juniors the other .As there are only 2 full time teacher s,the children are vertically grouped. The{Curriculum}is traditional in char acter,with the main emphasis on read- ing,writing and maths.However,the arts ,humanites and science are not ignored and we take great pride in music and drama.Our{methods}are individually and group based and few class lessons are given.Techniques of learning such as note taking,using reference books,ind ividual study etc. are emphasised.{Eq {uipment}includes a television,type writer,radio,tape recorder,computer, duplicator,various games and equipment for maths,English,geography and science.{Outdoor equipment}includes climbing frames and sports apparatus.
